definitions.text: the dressed skin of an animal (especially a large animal)
body covering of a living animal
prevent from being seen or discovered
be or go into hiding; keep out of sight, as for protection and safety
examples: Probably his horse would be close to where he was hiding
She is hiding out in a cabin in Montana

definitions.text: cover as if with a shroud
examples: The origins of this civilization are shrouded in mystery

definitions.text: make undecipherable or imperceptible by obscuring or concealing
